mapper.select: select no, parent_no, rownum,level, writer, regdate, lpad(' ', 2* (level-1), '>>>') || title as "title" from board2 start with parent_no is null connect by prior NO = parent_no order siblings by REGDATE
mapper.insert: insert into board2(no, parent_no, title, writer,content,regdate) values (board2_seq.nextval,#{parentNo},#{boardTitle},#{boardWriter},#{boardContent},sysdate)
